title: Constraints
description: This node presents a list of constraints that can be optionally placed on a node during deployment

available_time_of_day.description: Time during which node is available to be used by deployments. Parses the time in 24 hours format
available_time_of_day._comment: Eg: to indicate that node can be used for deployment between 8:00 a.m & 6:00 pm use format: 8-18

memory_limit.description: Memory limit that should not be exceeded by the deployment

cpu_limit.description: CPU Limit that should not be exceeded by the deployment

deployment_exclusions.description: List of deployment type's that are not allowed to use the node for deployment
